casebody.data:
DUBILIER CONDENSER CORPORATION, Appellant, v. AEROVOX WIRELESS CORPORATION, Appellee. No. 235. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 16, 1931. Clifton V. Edwards and Prank A. Bower, both of New York City, for appellant. Dean Fairbank, Hirsch & Poster, of New York City (Morris Hirsch and Franklin J. Poster, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [42 F.(2d) 485] affirmed.
